entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

entry.title: Beginning.
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. How to startHexo+NexT+MistThis is a useful blog 绝配：hexo+next主题及我走过的坑! More info:Next! Implement “hexo deploy” — When Error “error deployer not found:git” happends,the fixed code should be:1npm install hexo-deployer-git --save Add search pluggin npm install hedx-generator-searchdb --save Fatal Error:Site configuration:/空格/文本l内容Read more < !–more >Logo insert Font Awesome!
